alert.note: Alert for Gibson; Knox (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 20 at 11:38AM EDT until May 25 at 2:00PM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Indianapolis IN has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Indiana... White River at Petersburg and Hazleton. .Recent Rainfall across central Indiana will result in minor flooding along the white river. River flooding should begin by Sunday and continue through Tuesday or Wednesday. Additional Rainfall could produce higher crests. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY EVENING TO EARLY WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...White River at Hazleton. * WHEN...From Saturday evening to early Wednesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 18.0 feet, Floodwaters cover much low ground in agricultural season. Low lying oil fields...Pottsville Road and possibly a few other low rural roads flood. High water isolates Pottstown, a river cabin community. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - There is no current observed data. - Forecast...The river will rise above flood stage late tomorrow evening to 18.0 feet early Sunday afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage early Monday afternoon to 14.4 feet early Tuesday morning. - Flood stage is 16.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. This statement will be updated within the next 12 to 24 hours.
